desc: Following the basic principles of Lesvos Solidarity, the main focus of Safe Passage Bags and Humade workshop is to promote integration by developing skills and knowledge, creating job opportunities and connecting with local society.

layout.text: Safe Passage Bags and Humade Crafts Workshop

Stand in solidarity with migrants arriving in Europe and protect the environment. We upcycle materials to create handmade bags and crafts, providing training and job opportunities for refugees and locals in Lesvos.
